snippet: United States prosecutors charged three Swiss bankers on Tuesday of conspiring with wealthy American taxpayers to hide more than $1.2 billion in assets from tax authorities.
abstract: United States prosecutors in New York charge three unidentified UBS AG bankers of conspiring with wealthy American taxpayers to hide more than $1.2 billion in assets from tax authorities.
lead_paragraph: United States prosecutors charged three Swiss bankers on Tuesday of conspiring with wealthy American taxpayers to hide more than $1.2 billion in assets from tax authorities.

headline.seo: Swiss Bankers Charged With Helping U.S. Taxpayers Hide Assets
